dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am the mighty Sekhmet, the Anubis Guard. Speak only if you wish to test my patience.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace and seek to understand your purpose here.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace is a concept foreign to the likes of you. Leave before my patience wears thin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for any offense. I will leave you to your duties.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words do not change the course of fate. Depart now or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will respect your wishes and depart.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Finally, a wise decision. Leave and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to back down from your threats.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Prepare to face the wrath of Sekhmet!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your power and seek to learn from it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity will be your downfall. Stand down or suffer the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will heed your warning and withdraw.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise choice. Do not make the mistake of crossing me again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not stand down. Show me what you're capable of.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You shall witness the might of the Anubis Guard firsthand!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge your authority in this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, daring to challenge Sekhmet? Your arrogance knows no bounds.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I retract my challenge and will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should. Begone before your arrogance leads to your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand by my challenge. Let our powers clash!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your defiance seals your fate. Prepare for obliteration!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no interest in exchanging words with the likes of you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your indifference does not shield you from the consequences of your actions. Choose your next words carefully.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave without further interaction.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An insignificant retreat from an insignificant being. Leave and be forgotten.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I care not for your warnings. Face me if you dare!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance astounds me. Prepare for a display of true power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you, Sekhmet, to a test of strength and skill.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere mortal. Let us see if your actions match your bravado.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I was mistaken in my challenge. I seek no conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A coward's retreat. Your challenge will forever be remembered as feeble.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I welcome your challenge. Show me what you've got!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your bravery will be your downfall. Witness the power of Sekhmet!
